alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Duchesne County through 515 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tabiona to near Duchesne. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Duchesne, Myton, Tabiona, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Talmage, Moon Lake, Cedarview, Utahn, Bridgeland, Hanna, Upalco, Mountain Home, Arcadia, Neola and Altonah. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 75 and 115. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 33 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
